DOC.brief_summary: The trial conduct Asia . The aim trial evaluate effect insulin detemir blood glucose control Taiwanese patient type 2 diabetes fail OAD with/without once-daily NPH Insulin treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Insulin Detemir Blood Glucose Control Taiwanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Failing OAD
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes HbA1C : 7.011.0 % Previous diabetes treatment least 6 month BMI max . 35 kg/m2 Treatment oral antidiabetic drug ( OAD ) Type 1 diabetes Receipt investigational drug within last three month prior trial
